loaf.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: bread that is shaped and baked in one piece and can be cut into slices
loaf.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: food that has been cut into very small pieces, pressed together, and baked
loaf.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to spend time somewhere and not do very much
loaf.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: They spend all day loafing around on street corners.
